description.en: One of the cutest (and fastest) rides in all of Madrigal.
description.ar: One of the cutest (and fastest) rides in all of Madrigal.
description.br: Umas das mais fofas (e rápidas) montarias de toda Madrigal.
description.cns: 瑞加大陆最可爱(和最快)的飞行器之一。
description.de: Diese sechsbeinige Fantasiegestalt bringt dich in Windeseile an dein Ziel. Die Blume in seinen Händen beschert seinem Reiter einen bezaubernden Duft, wohin er auch fliegt.
description.fi: One of the cutest (and fastest) rides in all of Madrigal.
description.fil: One of the cutest (and fastest) rides in all of Madrigal.
description.fr: Il n'en a pas l'air mais il bat tous les monstres volants en vitesse pure.
description.id: Salah satu dari yang paling lucu cepat di seluruh Madrigal.
description.it: One of the cutest (and fastest) rides in all of Madrigal.
description.jp: マドリガル全土で最もかわいい乗り物の1つ。
description.kr: 마드리갈 전체에서 가장 귀여운 (그리고 가장 빠른) 놀이기구 중 하나입니다.
description.nl: One of the cutest (and fastest) rides in all of Madrigal.
description.pl: One of the cutest (and fastest) rides in all of Madrigal.
description.ru: One of the cutest (and fastest) rides in all of Madrigal.
description.sp: Una de las más lindas (y rápidas) monturas de todo Madrigal.
description.sw: One of the cutest (and fastest) rides in all of Madrigal.
description.th: หนึ่งในเครื่องเล่นที่น่ารักที่สุด (และเร็วที่สุด) ใน Madrigal ทั้งหมด
description.tw: 瑪德利賈最可愛（也是最快）的騎乘之一。
description.vi: Một trong những chuyến đi dễ thương nhất (và nhanh nhất) ở Madrigal.
